action cards.name: Mixed Signal
action cards.description: Play at anytime. Swap another player's face downm 'Set' Attack Card with your dace down. 'Set' Attack Card

action cards.name: Edge Out
action cards.description: Play on another player before they reveal their 'Set' Attack Card. Discard it. They may not attack this turn.

item cards.name: Potion Of Healing
item cards.description: Play this face up immediately when dealt. Tip to gain 25 life points. If used to heal a willing party member other than yourself, place the card in your scoring pile for 3 Prestige.
